  16. /* Dynamic loading of C primitives. */

  18. #ifndef CAML_DYNLINK_H
  19. ‌#define CAML_DYNLINK_H

  21. #ifdef CAML_INTERNALS

  23. #include "misc.h"

  25. /* Build the table of primitives, given a search path, a list
  26.    of shared libraries, and a list of primitive names
  27.    (all three 0-separated in char arrays).
  28.    Abort the runtime system on error.
  29.    Calling this frees caml_shared_libs_path (not touching its contents). */
  30. extern void caml_build_primitive_table(char_os * lib_path,
  31.                                        char_os * libs,
  32.                                        char * req_prims);

  34. /* The search path for shared libraries */
  35. extern struct ext_table caml_shared_libs_path;

  37. /* Build the table of primitives as a copy of the builtin primitive table.
  38.    Used for executables generated by ocamlc -output-obj. */
  39. extern void caml_build_primitive_table_builtin(void);

  41. /* Unload all the previously loaded shared libraries */
  42. extern void caml_free_shared_libs(void);

  44. /* Return the effective location of the standard library */
  45. extern char_os * caml_get_stdlib_location(void);

  47. /* Parse ld.conf and add the lines read to caml_shared_libs_path */
  48. extern char_os * caml_parse_ld_conf(void);

  50. #endif /* CAML_INTERNALS */

  52. #endif /* CAML_DYNLINK_H */
